file.name: swagger.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Minimal Flask API Example
  description: This file is for demonstration purposes only, you should fill in your own details.
  version: 0.0.0
servers:
  - url: http://localhost:5000
    description: This is a dummy value describing the base URL for the API.
paths:
  /:
    get:
      summary: Returns the default response from the API.
      description: Optional extended description in CommonMark or HTML.
      responses:
        '200':    # status code
          description: The default response.
          content:
            text/plain:
              "Hello, world"
  /health:
    get:
      summary: Used to check the API is responsive.
      description: Optional extended description in CommonMark or HTML.
      responses:
        '200':    # status code
          description: The default response.
          content:
            text/plain:
              "OK"

Error: json: cannot unmarshal string into Go struct field Response.paths.get.responses.content of type ogen.Media
